page.title: 18STANCLIFFE SCHOOLBOY
page.content: The sports played at Stancliffe are Cricket, Tennis and Rounders in the summer term, Rugger, Hockey, Netball and Football in the winter and spring terms. In a normal day at Stancliffe, there are seven forty minute lessons plus a forty minute break-time. There is prep(home-work) after tea, one prep for the juniors and two for the seniors. One prep lasts for thirty minutes. Bedtimes at quarter hour intervals start at 6:45pm until 8:30pm(in the winter & spring terms) or 8:45pm(in the summer). In the free time there are various other activities, such as Go-Karting, Golf, Swimming, etc. As Stancliffe is privately owned and financed, it's timetable differs from the State school system.
